title: Bug 28833Eclipse no longer responds to 'Quit' AppleEvent
OB: Bug 28833Eclipse no longer responds to 'Quit' AppleEvent M4(regression from M3)Eclipse no longer responds to 'Quit' AppleEvents, as a consequence you cannotshutdown Mac OS X if Eclipse is running.To try without halting MacOSX: in dock open context menu on Eclipse app and select'Quit'
